name: Never Too Much Web Log Analyzer
short_description:
There may be a such thing as 'Too much data,' but this application will leave that up to you. With this unique web log analyzer, you will be able to check your logs against all types of historical data including:
-Physical location of the user
-Weather conditions at the time of the visit
-Geophysical conditions at the time of visit
-Solar conditions
-Other planet locations
-News Headlines

Historical views:
-Time Slider - Play back visits in various time scales and dimensions
-ClamShell - Show days of week overlayed, hours overlayed, or any other time dimensions overlayed.

Enhanced DDOS investigation tools:
-estimates possible locations for DDOS attack call
-Possible DDOS engines used
-DDOS variables:
  -number of connections per host
  -time constraints
  -number of attackers
summary: Never Too Much Web Log Analyzer. When "Too Much" isn't enough.
